Hi, I'm Adam!

Software Engineer and Lifelong Learner

Hire Me Resume

About Me

I'm a fullstack software developer who builds data-driven and well-architected software solutions. Currently, I'm completing my last semester at Auburn University and seeking a job opportunity starting in Spring 2023.

Get to know me

I am a self-motivated and detail-oriented engineer who is most content when being a productive member of a high-functioning team.

I enjoy modeling complex, real-world domains in software, particularly ones that result in interesting database structures.

I also have a strong passion for studying theoretical mathematics, especially cryptography and number theory.

On my shelf
